title: Solo/Dynamic Queue Games
body: I am solo preference. I am just wondering why am I getting teams of 2 or more on my team and/or on the opposite team?

replies.body:
A Ranked Emblem doesn't change what kind of team composition you'll see in ranked games. It simply shows others your preference and what you win the majority of your matches as. 

I recommend checking out our [Ranked Emblem FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209346066-Ranked-Emblems) for complete details on how these work. Let me know if you have any questions.
